meanings.definition: The act of looking at something.
meanings.sent1: During the viewing of the movie, everyone was quiet and focused.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy viewing beautiful paintings at the art gallery.
meanings.sent3: The cat's curious viewing of the bird outside was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The viewing of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: Her viewing of the shooting stars was a magical experience.

meanings.definition: The ability to see or watch something.
meanings.sent1: His poor eyesight affected his viewing of distant objects.
meanings.sent2: The telescope enhances our viewing of the stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The owl's exceptional night vision aids in its viewing of prey.
meanings.sent4: The viewing of the distant mountains was like gazing into a dream.
meanings.sent5: The microscope allows for detailed viewing of tiny organisms.

meanings.definition: A sight or scene that is seen.
meanings.sent1: The breathtaking viewing of the Grand Canyon left us speechless.
meanings.sent2: The city skyline provides a stunning viewing from the rooftop.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected viewing of a rainbow on a cloudy day brought smiles.
meanings.sent4: The viewing of the vast ocean reminded me of life's endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The nighttime viewing of the city lights was like a sea of stars.
